== Main Inclusion Report for swfdec-gnome ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/swfdec-gnome]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:'swfdec-gnome' provides tools to integrate Flash into the GNOME desktop. It contains a standalone Flash player and a thumbnailer but it is not a flash browser plugin. swfdec-gnome is now a blessed module for the upcoming GNOME 2.22 release.
# ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia entries.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port(s).
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions.
** No showstopper Debian bugs.
** Package maintenance in Debian is vigorous.
** Upstream development is vigorous.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Compliant with FHS and Debian policy.
** Packaging system is CDBS but no patch system is implemented.
 0. ''Dependencies:'' libswfdec-0.5-4 <nowiki>[[http://mirrors.kernel.org/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/swfdec0.5/]]</nowiki>
** libswfdec-0.5-4 is not in main. It is presently in universe.
